channel.title: Syndrix 667
channel.description:
[center] - http://syndrix.net/webclient.html
Unique game based of f Matrix/DynastyScape with many new features. Recreation of DynastyScape. Currently a Revision of 667.
We can be considered a brand new server, which is what we're. Our owner has experience with Java and Managing an RSPS. Since we're a new server we're currently in need of players and staff which we will have open eyes towards.
We're here to improve the Next Generation of RSPS, our goal is to start off fresh and be as best as we can be. Our server consists of a PK Point System of pking. This is not a spawn server, you can obtain items with PK points in a shop. We also have a variety of different skills with a unique combat system enhancement. We have daily updates.
We have 667 Graphics in our Client. We have a lot of features. They Include Bosses, Minigames, and more!
Please visit our forums at http://Syndrix.net for more Information.
This is a server you definitely want to check out.
Here are a few Images (HP is high because of an admin command):
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ewgqyq.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img31/4970/pkpoints.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vmvtib.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img843/5641/questguide.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Syndrix 667
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Nolagg, post:7, topic:466608”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=583219.msg4153849#msg4153849 date=1352580660]

I can’t do anything but sit here and question ‘why?’.
You did nothing. I don’t understand why people even attempt to get players. There’s nothing different from this and that other shit server you leeched. You probably can’t even list all the features you didn’t make. Stop wasting my time and stop wasting other people’s time.

Obviously an Idiot, I’ve improved so much, this is not leeched it’s based off Matrix Base moron, I added Bosses, Shops, New Interfaces, Better GWD, Frosts, Etc.

Ha you’re funny. Prove it.
[/quote]

Come online to my server.[/quote]

The purpose of this topic is to persuade people to join your server. I’m not persuaded. I don’t want to log in. Prove it to me and everybody else by posting the pictures and/or information on it.

Read full topic
